text: This is a list of episodes of the animated series The Ren & Stimpy Show. It was first on Nickelodeon on August 11, 1991. It went for five seasons for 52 episodes. In 1995, The Ren & Stimpy Show was cancelled by Nickelodeon, its creator, John Kricfalusi, made a new series about the characters. It was called Ren & Stimpy "Adult Party Cartoon". It was for a more adult audience. == Series overview == Season Episodes Originally released First released Last released Network Pilot December 21, 1990 — 1 6 August 11, 1991 February 23, 1992 Nickelodeon MTV 2 12 August 15, 1992 May 23, 1993 3 10 November 20, 1993 July 30, 1994 4 14 October 1, 1994 April 1, 1995 5 10 June 3, 1995 October 20, 1996 6 10 July 21, 2024 (online) Comedy Central == Episodes == Ep. # Title Directed by Release date Prod. # Overall Season Pilot (1990) 0 0 "Big House Blues" John Kricfalusi December 21, 1990 R&S-001; Season 1 (1991-1992) 1 1 "Stimpy's Big Day!" \----"The Big Shot!"
